entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Carman
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:17 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.7°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
